long_description: The Oakley Plaintiff polarized sunglasses feature shatterproof polycarbonate lenses, flexible metal frames and glare-reducing polarization, all in a time-honored style. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Optically correct, shatterproof and scratch-resistant Plutonite(R) polycarbonate lenses offer great durability. Ultra-lightweight C-5(TM) metal alloy frame material offers premium, durable comfort. Titanium Mono Shock(TM) hinges can hyper flex when necessary, offering functional flexibility for vigorous activity. Unique 3-point fit from Oakley includes optical alignment for sharp accurate vision, impact absorption for improved safety and geometry that extends the peripheral view. Gray-tinted polarized lenses cut through glare to reduce eyestrain in moderate-to-bright conditions while enhancing true color perception. Oakley Plaintiff polarized sunglasses feature relatively high 8.75 base-curve lens geometry for optimized peripheral view and side coverage.
